name: Clean Water Initiative 2025
description: Support clean water access for communities in need. Each redemption provides 1 month of clean water for a family.

name: Hydroponics Solar Spring Campaign
description: Solar-powered hydroponic systems for sustainable farming. Help communities grow fresh produce year-round.

name: Water Wells for Rural Africa
description: Fund water well construction in rural African communities. Each redemption sponsors well maintenance for 3 months.
